metadata.title: CVE-2015-0288 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The X509_to_X509_REQ function in crypto/x509/x509_req.c in OpenSSL before0.9.8zf, 1.0.0 before 1.0.0r, 1.0.1 before 1.0.1m, and 1.0.2 before 1.0.2amight allow attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointerdereference and application crash) via an invalid certificate key.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0288` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libssl1.0.0 - 1.0.1f-1ubuntu11
openssl - 1.0.1f-1ubuntu11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openssl package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.1f-1ubuntu11').
